languages.text: {n}Культистка бесшумно приближается к медикарию.{/n} "Смерть — верная спутница тех, кто сеет семена веры меж звездами. У нее тысячи лиц, но я покажу тебе только одно... То, которое ты боишься больше всего. То, что ты видел в кошмарах."

{n}Kibellah approaches the officer without making a sound.{/n} "Death is the faithful companion of those who sow the seeds of faith amid the stars. Though it has a thousand faces, I will show you but one... The one you fear most. The one you have seen in your nightmares."
languages.original_text: {n}Культистка бесшумно приближается к медикарию.{/n} "Смерть — верная спутница тех, кто сеет семена веры меж звездами. У нее тысячи лиц, но я покажу тебе только одно... То, которое ты боишься больше всего. То, что ты видел в кошмарах."

traits.locale_text: {n}The cultist approaches the medicae officer without making a sound.{/n} "Death is a faithful companion of those who sow the seeds of faith amid the stars. Though it has a thousand faces, I will show you but one... The one you fear most. The one you have seen in your nightmares."

{n}Kibellah approaches the officer without making a sound.{/n} "Death is the faithful companion of those who sow the seeds of faith amid the stars. Though it has a thousand faces, I will show you but one... The one you fear most. The one you have seen in your nightmares."

{n}Kibellah approaches the officer without making a sound.{/n} "Death is the faithful companion of those who sow the seeds of faith amid the stars. Though it has a thousand faces, I will show you but one... The one you fear most. The one you have seen in your nightmares."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah s'approche de l'officier sans un bruit.{/n} « La mort est la fidèle compagne de ceux qui sèment les graines de la foi parmi les étoiles. Bien qu'elle ait mille visages, je vais vous en montrer un seul... Celui que vous craignez le plus. Celui que vous avez vu dans vos cauchemars. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah approaches the officer without making a sound.{/n} "Death is the faithful companion of those who sow the seeds of faith amid the stars. Though it has a thousand faces, I will show you but one... The one you fear most. The one you have seen in your nightmares."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah s'approche de l'officier sans un bruit.{/n} « La mort est la fidèle compagne de ceux qui sèment les graines de la foi parmi les étoiles. Bien qu'elle ait mille visages, je vais vous en montrer un seul... Celui que vous craignez le plus. Celui que vous avez vu dans vos cauchemars. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah se acerca al oficial sin hacer un solo ruido.{/n} «La muerte es la fiel compañera de quienes siembran la semilla de la fe entre las estrellas. Aunque mil caras tiene, yo te mostraré una sola de ellas... la que más temes. La que has visto en tus pesadillas».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah approaches the officer without making a sound.{/n} "Death is the faithful companion of those who sow the seeds of faith amid the stars. Though it has a thousand faces, I will show you but one... The one you fear most. The one you have seen in your nightmares."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah se acerca al oficial sin hacer un solo ruido.{/n} «La muerte es la fiel compañera de quienes siembran la semilla de la fe entre las estrellas. Aunque mil caras tiene, yo te mostraré una sola de ellas... la que más temes. La que has visto en tus pesadillas».

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈悄无声息地接近那位军官。{/n}“对那些在群星之中播撒信仰之种的人而言，死亡是他们的忠诚伴侣。尽管它有一千张面孔，但我只给你看其中一张……你最恐惧的那张，你在无数噩梦中曾见过的那张。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah approaches the officer without making a sound.{/n} "Death is the faithful companion of those who sow the seeds of faith amid the stars. Though it has a thousand faces, I will show you but one... The one you fear most. The one you have seen in your nightmares."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈悄无声息地接近那位军官。{/n}“对那些在群星之中播撒信仰之种的人而言，死亡是他们的忠诚伴侣。尽管它有一千张面孔，但我只给你看其中一张……你最恐惧的那张，你在无数噩梦中曾见过的那张。”

languages.text: {n}キベラは音を出さずに、士官に近付いた。{/n}「死は、星の中に信仰の種を蒔く者の忠実な伴侶である。死には千の顔があるが、私が見せるのはひとつだけだ。それは、お前が最も恐れるもの。悪夢に現れるものだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah approaches the officer without making a sound.{/n} "Death is the faithful companion of those who sow the seeds of faith amid the stars. Though it has a thousand faces, I will show you but one... The one you fear most. The one you have seen in your nightmares."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは音を出さずに、士官に近付いた。{/n}「死は、星の中に信仰の種を蒔く者の忠実な伴侶である。死には千の顔があるが、私が見せるのはひとつだけだ。それは、お前が最も恐れるもの。悪夢に現れるものだ」

languages.text: {n}Kibellah tritt völlig lautlos vor den Offizier.{/n} "Der Tod ist der treue Gefährte derer, die die Saat des Glaubens zwischen den Sternen aussähen. Er hat eintausend Gesichter, doch ich zeige Euch nur ein einziges ... Jenes, das Ihr am meisten fürchtet. Jenes, das Ihr in Euren Albträumen gesehen habt."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah approaches the officer without making a sound.{/n} "Death is the faithful companion of those who sow the seeds of faith amid the stars. Though it has a thousand faces, I will show you but one... The one you fear most. The one you have seen in your nightmares."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah tritt völlig lautlos vor den Offizier.{/n} "Der Tod ist der treue Gefährte derer, die die Saat des Glaubens zwischen den Sternen aussähen. Er hat eintausend Gesichter, doch ich zeige Euch nur ein einziges ... Jenes, das Ihr am meisten fürchtet. Jenes, das Ihr in Euren Albträumen gesehen habt."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah tek bir ses çıkarmadan subaya yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Ölüm, yıldızların arasına inanç tohumları ekenlerin sadık yoldaşıdır. Lakin onun bin sureti vardır. Ben sana bunların yalnızca bir tanesini göstereceğim. Senin en korktuğunu. Kâbuslarında gördüğünü."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah approaches the officer without making a sound.{/n} "Death is the faithful companion of those who sow the seeds of faith amid the stars. Though it has a thousand faces, I will show you but one... The one you fear most. The one you have seen in your nightmares."
